Basic statistics for gene.

Function gene_stats generate a data frame containing basic statistics for chosen gene.

gene_stats(data, condition, gene, round = 2)

Arguments

data

data frame containing genes expression or methylation mapped to gene.
condition

vector of levels of groups coresponding to order of samples in data.
gene

symbol of chosen gene.
round

num

Value

data frame with following columns:

min

minimal value for chosen gene in group

1st Q

first quartile

med

median of gene values

mean

mean for gene values

3rd Q

third quartile

max

maximal value for chosen gene in group

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
